name: Bit by Bit: Adventures in Computerland
name_original: Bit by Bit: Adventures in Computerland
description:
Premise:

   One day while you are hard at work on your CS106A pset you fall asleep. You awake to find yourself in your computer, transformed into Bits and Bytes. At first, you think it a dream, but then you realize you simply cannot escape. You learn that you must head to Queen Main– the main function— in order to get back to life at Stanford. With the help of friendly functions, various variables, and an array of awesome characters in a CS world, will you reach Queen Main and escape computerland or will you crash the program and go down along with it? 

NOTES: created by Ecy for CS377g Project 4: Refining a Game :)
